message.body: Gavi I kind of want to call the painting of you and connor 'Gavin and I don't trust men' Lololol are you ok w that and if not, I'm open to ideas
Another perennial favorite would be, 'men lie'
lol actually I kind of like that lolol men lie. And maybe male tears for the other one. Maybe men lie: with subtitle Gavi and I distrust men, still brainstorming I dunno
All of these warm my misandrist heart
